name: Lakshmi Inspired Jewellery
description: The world's first traditional India digital fashion collection is ideated and pioneered by Ravi Singh, a newcomer to digital fashion yet avid supporter of inspiring traditional cultural inclusivity in the industry, 3D modeled by digital fashion designer, Lorena Bello, and animated and rendered by DIGITALAX. For the jewellery piece, the owl is a vehicle of Lakshmi, the goddess of wealth and good fortune in Hinduism.

attributes.value: Traditional India Digital Fashion, Cultural Fashion, Lakshmi Purity, Wealth, Good Fortune
